                    <div class="title-b">
                      <h1 class="title" id="page-title">Recipes For Weapons</h1>
                    </div>
                  </div>

                                                <div class="clear-both"><!-- --></div>
                                                <div id="content-content" class="clear-both">
                  <div class="view view-profession-items view-id-profession_items view-display-id-page_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <div id="node-15953" class="database node clear-block">
<table>
  <tr>
    <td class="image"><img  class="imagefield imagefield-field_image" width="28" height="30" alt="" src="http://global.hidden-street.net/sites/global.hidden-street.net/files/items/dark-valhalla-helmet-recipe_1.png?1309883378" /></td>

    <td width="260">
      <strong>Agares Bloody Fear Recipe      </strong>
    </td>
    <td>
            <div><strong>Sold for:</strong> 
        1 mesos      </div>
    </td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td colspan="2">
      <strong>Effects:</strong>
      -    </td>
    <td>
      <strong>Max per slot:</strong> 
      ?    </td>

  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td colspan="3" class="mouse-hover">
            
      <div><strong>Dropped by:</strong> 
      -      </div>
    </td>
  </tr>
  
      
    <tr>

    <td colspan="3" class="item-desc">
      <strong>Description:</strong> 
      <p>A recipe for an Agares Bloody Fear.</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
    
  <tr>
    <td colspan="3"><strong>Available from:</strong>					     
    	        <ul>

        
                
                
        
                  <li>The treasure <a href="/items/treasures/mystery-recipe">Mystery Recipe</a> (0.0463285% chance) rewards this item.</li>
                
                </ul>
          </td>
  </tr>

<div id="block-views-quote-block_1" class="block block-views block-3 block-last clear-both">
  <div class="block-t">
    <div class="block-b">
      
      <div class="block-content content">
        <div class="view view-quote view-id-quote view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-2">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
      
  <div class="views-field-field-quote-value">

                <div class="field-content">GMs will never ask for your username and password. Even Hidden Street staff will never ask for it.</div>
  </div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>       </div>
    </div>
  </div>  
</div>

            </div>
          
          <div class="clear-both"><!-- --></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
